summary: Completed frontend testing of Tableros UX improvements. All 8 critical features verified and working correctly: grab cursor, full-card draggable, drag & drop between columns, empty state visibility, horizontal scroll, card editing, label picker, and visual drag feedback.
critical_code_review_comments: BoardView.jsx implementation is solid - uses @dnd-kit properly with SortableCard applying {...attributes} {...listeners} on container div
DroppableListArea component correctly enables drop on empty lists
handleDragOver properly moves cards between lists in real-time
Empty state with icon and descriptive text ('No hay tareas - Arrastra aquí o crea una nueva') is always visible
DragOverlay provides excellent visual feedback with rotation (rotate-3) and shadow (shadow-2xl)
seed_data_creation: Added test card 'Nueva tarea de prueba' and green label to 'wdaqdsada' card during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Tableros UX improvements fully tested and working. All drag & drop features verified via Playwright automation. Key findings: 1) cursor:grab works on cards, 2) entire card is draggable, 3) drag between columns works with visual feedback, 4) empty columns show 'No hay tareas' message, 5) horizontal scroll container exists (.overflow-x-auto), 6) card edit/label features work correctly.

cursor_grab_on_hover.verification: JavaScript evaluation confirmed cursor style is 'grab'

full_card_draggable.verification: Successfully dragged card from any part of the card, not just an icon

drag_drop_between_columns.verification: Dragged 'Second Task' from 'To Do' to 'In Progress' column successfully

empty_state_visibility.verification: Empty column 'sadfdsad' shows 'No hay tareas' and 'Arrastra aquí o crea una nueva'

horizontal_scroll.verification: Container has .overflow-x-auto class and style minWidth: 'max-content'

card_editing.verification: Edit button shows on hover, clicking opens inline edit form with Cancelar/Guardar buttons

label_picker.verification: Tag button shows label picker with 6 colors, clicking adds label to card

drag_visual_feedback.verification: DragOverlay shows card with cyan border, shadow-2xl, and rotate-3 transform
